column3: â€œThis BlackBerry Indica is the bomb it smells sweet taste great and to get a great couch lock for movies.... I usually take it right before bed and get a good nights sleep it eases my panic and stress levels to where I forget I have anything to worry about. this strain is definitely a top 10 in my home and do not drive or operate any heavy machinery while using this product....â€

â€œHas a very pleasant physical Indica head high that is not too heavy. Very energetic and happy high from the sativa side yet with no grandiose euphoria: very giggly and innocent kind of high. I'm high right now and everything is making me laugh, hahahaha. Pretty functional and very clear: good for long creative nights! No disruption in short term memory processing or sensory input (must have high CBD). A very unique a...â€
â€œA wise man once said, dopest dope i ever smoke".....â€"

â€œVery nice strain. I was able to choose my high: to just ride the high and have fun or to function normally if need be. Pretty dense buds, visually appealing, and light smell pre-smoke. While smoking I definitely felt the head high while it relaxed my body, de-stressed my mind, and made me feel all around better. When riding the high I got hungry, was very relaxed, and just wanted to sleep after a while. When choosing...â€
â€œThis Indica will take away your pain and leave you couchlocked and stress free. Gives you a nice relaxes, no worries in the world feeling. Great for evening use.â€

â€œi have severe (as opposed to mild/medium) sleep apnea.  it helps.

bought it from Garden of Eden, Castro Valley.
pure indica.  not to be confused w/ Blackberry Kush.â€

â€œOne of my favorite indica strains! Knocks you off your feet completely into a new experience with yourself. Creative, relaxed, and couch lazy. Best indica to use if you want to end your night with a great baked spiritual, personal, and body high experience. I recommend taking this before bed time to treat yourself after a hard day of work.â€

â€œBlackberry is a strain that can be enjoyed anytime of day.  The taste is smooth and sweet, it's fairly unique.  As for effects I've seen this strain range around the mid 20 percentile mark and it hits like it.  At smaller doses you'll be bubbly, on the go, and able to function.  While at larger doses you may be comfortably couched locked trying to remember what you had for lunch.  Either way Blackberry is a very enjo...â€

â€œGot the strain crossed with OG Chem, it was superb! Super sweet taste and smell, immediate effects in the mind, thick body buzz hangs around longer, about an hour after the sativa begins to slow it's course. A great strain on it's own, but Blackberry Chem OG is one of the best buds I've smoked in over 5 years.â€
â€œAwesome. This took care of my headaches.  It pretty much numb it up until my high was gone. But overall it's great. Slight berry taste at the end tooâ€

â€œWonderful strain.  Works very well for relaxation, muscle fatigue, and spasms.  The only down side is the 'one toke over the line' issue.  Two or three hits is enough to stop a rhino.  Anything beyond that will just put you in a staring coma.  Don't even think about reaching for the remote.  It's just too far away...

The plant grows big and bushy with a pungent fruity odor.  However, the smell isn't immediately reco...â€

â€œName: Blackberry

Genetics: Black Domina x Strawberry Cough

Grade: A

Type: Hybrid


Looks: Purple and rich.

Smell: Fruity, like a fresh-picked bag of blackberries.

Taste: A+ taste.  Like fruity earthy pine .  Numbs the mouth on first inhale.

Buzz Type: Instant head rush and a creeper knockout. Takes 5 minutes or so to really kick it, but when it does, one will find themselves sprawled across the c...â€

â€œI bought two grams of some Blackberry - the last bit they had at The Humboldt County Collective, actually - and loved it to bits and pieces. The buds were incredibly frosted and gleaning with beautiful purple leaves. Really beautiful buds; I wish I could provide pictures. The strength of the Blackberry was pretty nice and potent, very indica-based and good for nighttime medication.â€

â€œIt must really depend on how it was grown. I got this strain in small bud form at Alternatives in Santa Rosa and I have not found any herb that I like better. It is smooth and has a definite blackberry after-taste. I am on dialysis and it really helped my nausea. I felt young again. Thank you Alternatives you guys are amazing.â€

â€œ4.5 stars. I started with half my usual first dose, and my pain went from 8 down to 2! (out of 10). It took a few minutes to come on. Very euphoric yet clear headed, and I did get a bit yawn-y after about 20 minutes. My second dose eliminated pain but motivate me to the mattress.  Smell and taste are just as described.â€

â€œMy all time favorite strain, makes me very aroused, and also makes have amazing sex with my woman, no joke. Very uplifting cerebral high, but also makes you very relaxed, in a nutshell; she is a true hybrid. Very sweet berry taste and zing, you will not regret getting an eighth of the true Blackberry strain, peace and love all! ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜â€

â€œThis herb had my ass in a coma, i literally rolled a full spliff on Raw brown paper.  My friend and I smoked it.  I was on my ass on the couch barely functioning an hour and half later.  We watched the superbowl, then i ate brownies (regular good chocolate) and ate more brownies and by 1130 i was dozing by 1am i thought it was 3am and i was sleep...i slept till 1130 am couldn't move my body still feeling sluggish.  I...â€

â€œIf you're looking for a strain that will help muscle spasms and allow you to get to sleep more quirky, and stay asleep longer, look no further than Blackberry.  Can't stress it enough, it's a great strain for nighttime use for those of with muscle spasms.  Presumably, it should be a great strain for anybody else to help all kinds of sleep disorders. :)

It's too bad, though, as my local dispensary got it as an extr...â€
â€œA very nice strain, unique smell and taste, great high and some very good bud would recommend to most cannabis smokers.â€
â€œLove it~~~great for anxiety, bipolar, fatigue, creativity, depression and it is long lasting. I like mango. Left great too.â€
â€œThis is a great pain reliever I look forward to it every day after work. You will love this quality atrainâ€

â€œExperience: Mild high with strong sativa presence. Physically relaxing, mentally stimulating, hunger inducing. Very potent, didnâ€™t even finish the bowl (at first!).
Usage: Daytime, can extend into early evening if you want to stay active. 
Look/Feel: Dark green with numerous thick salmon-pink/orange hairs give a light purple hue to these fluffy buds. Scattered medium to large white crystals on small leaves. 
Smell: S...â€
â€œtaste good, however did not find this strain to work as well for my pain compared to other strains.â€

â€œIf you are very particular about what you smoke then this is what you're looking for. Beautiful crystal nugs with a little bit of orange with a very sweet smell. I highly recommend this strain. Very tasty, smell sweet, looks good, and effects are very relaxing....... All around great stain!â€

â€œI lost over 45 lbs from the energy this strain gives me.â€

â€œThis is a strain that is more enjoyable according to the smoker's preference. Blackberry is a very very strong Indica. So, if you're an Indica person, you'll love it! The high is very overwhelming if you smoke a lot, I got pretty dizzy and just had to sit down. If you chill and watch a movie or something, I think this is a perfect strain, but for being active and getting things done, this strain is a killer. Another ...â€

â€œKiller strain all together. I must say that the grower of this cannabis plant put lots of love and care to make sure that they produced the best flower possible. Dockside Co-op in Seattle is where I got this batch of cannabis and I must say that when I noticed that the trichomes were actually purple I was impressed with the over all look of the flower. Once I rolled one up and medicated with the flower I noticed that...â€

â€œI grew a batch of this a while back. Great indica strain that has a nice berry scent and flavor. The feeling produced is great for insomnia and makes you feel sleepy and relaxed. Smoking this for the flavor alone is worth it ,but the nice body stone is great for patients in need of pain relieving forces. Similiar strains to this I would say are blueberry and northern lights and the like.â€

â€œGood post-shift smoke. It calms some of my muscle pain, I'm a little zoned-out, but I'm not in full couch-lock. Smooth going in, fruity with a slight diesel taste on exhale, but mostly berry sweetness.â€
â€œNice mellow buzz, feels indica dominant.  Love the aroma, I'm digging just the blackberry instead of blackberry kush for a change. Definitely worth it.â€

â€œthis shit was really fucking great i got high as fuck and just laughed in like 1000 minutes, right now i am high as fuck and want to collect achivments so i have to write over 100 words shit this shit will be hard man i have to write a whole fucking book shit haha well i have comed a little bit but its still like 40 words left but i will make it then will i get the mother fucking achivment damn my mum will get proud ...â€

â€œThis is my go to strain. 

I deal with Anxiety from PTSD and arthritis. I use this daily when my shoulder starts to hurt and next thing you know, I feel better, happy and cleaning. It kind of lifts my depression away and I don't mind vacuuming or chores. It's a good value for daily relief.  =)â€

â€œI recently had an appendectomy and gall bladder removal. I am not a fan of opioids. This strain has been the best pain killer ever. I go from being bed ridden to walking around as if I never had surgery. My fiancÃ© has to remind me that I am not suppose to be moving around that much. Wonderful strain. Will continue to use :)â€

â€œGood post-shift smoke. It calms some of my muscle pain, I'm a little zoned-out, but I'm not in full couch-lock. Smooth going in, fruity with a slight diesel taste on exhale, but mostly berry sweetness.â€

â€œGreat body high/buzz along with the cerebral effects. The effects of the body high will also have a numb feeling to it, and Blackberry can be couch locky. The cerebral effects will kick out your stresses and anxiety, and leave you in a uplifting happy euphoria! This is a good day time strain if you are not doing anything and at home. I wouldn't do difficult task on this, just sit down, watch some tv, listen to music,...â€
â€œsmoking in dab form has impressively taken my chronic pain to a level 2 and it's never that low! awesome creative head high with a melting into couch body high...â€
â€œNice mellow buzz, feels indica dominant.  Love the aroma, I'm digging just the blackberry instead of blackberry kush for a change. Definitely worth it.â€

â€œGrabbed and gram and damn. I felt really good. This strain can lean either way and I believe I tried the Indica-dom pheno-type, because the cerebral high was short lived, but my body felt wonderful. I'm not prone to soreness or injuries, but who gets mad at a prolonged and warm body high. Nice sweet smoke produced and the cerebral portion is nearly instantaneous. Great strain for work or pleasure.â€

â€œI grew a batch of this a while back. Great indica strain that has a nice berry scent and flavor. The feeling produced is great for insomnia and makes you feel sleepy and relaxed. Smoking this for the flavor alone is worth it ,but the nice body stone is great for patients in need of pain relieving forces. Similiar strains to this I would say are blueberry and northern lights and the like.â€

â€œI'm an indica guy because I can't sleep. Two reasons I bought this strain, the sleepiness it brings and also that aroused feeling that these people claim. I bought an eighth worth on the day my vape came. It has a good earthy/fruity blend. I wouldn't know what its like when smoked because I quit that and got a vape but I know the my new method enhances the qualities of Blackberry.â€
â€œsmoking in dab form has impressively taken my chronic pain to a level 2 and it's never that low! awesome creative head high with a melting into couch body high...â€

â€œSmells great, tastes great, Blackberry is a favorite of my wife's and in my top 10 right now, easily. It feels indica dominant in its slight heaviness but at the same time, somewhere in the middle with the floatyness you get from this long-lasting, kick back strain.â€
â€œNice mellow buzz, feels indica dominant.  Love the aroma, I'm digging just the blackberry instead of blackberry kush for a change. Definitely worth it.â€
â€œblack berry is definitly a good strain. gives a nice chill high.â€

â€œGood post-shift smoke. It calms some of my muscle pain, I'm a little zoned-out, but I'm not in full couch-lock. Smooth going in, fruity with a slight diesel taste on exhale, but mostly berry sweetness.â€

â€œThis is one of those strains where you smoke it and get rush of happiness and euphoria. It takes me to the land of positivety and laughter. I recommend this for depression as it helps me with mine. Pretty good on pain (i have constant TMD pain in both my joints) and tastes delicious!!â€
â€œI really liked it but thought it was real earth tasting... not that great. but high was awesome. it is real dense so you feel like ur got ur moneys worth.â€
â€œamazing strain... another top shelf killer bud... must smoke if possible... great high and very very relaxingâ€

â€œBlackberry has an amazing taste. Im smoking on blackberry shatter from Oregon at the moment, and it smells exactly the same as the flower I had a month ago. Definitely a strong cerebral behind the eyes" feeling as well as strong sedative body buzz.â€"
â€œawesome tastes. could tell the black domina a mile off. pleasant taste and nose. this is for fastbuds american autoflowers BlackBerry. a true indca pheno I received. hot shit! 10/10 -El Kevoâ€
â€œStrong hit on first toke...make you couchlock if not active! But good sweet berry taste and smoke.â€

â€œWonderful. Not harsh on the throat. Good mix of buzzy body high and chill; my back spasms felt much better after smoking this. Could work if you need a bedroom boost. I had a really great bowl, flavors not overwhelming either.â€
â€œThis is probably one of my favorite strains, the high is relaxing but you can still get a lot done. Definitely a keeper and would recommend to anyone!â€
â€œReal easy going high. More focused than expected too! This is a pretty solid balance of sativa and indica. I would recommend for physical pain and mental woes.â€
â€œI felt the Indica in it a LOT more than the Sativa, but that may be due to my ADD. It was a functional high, and would probably rate this as my favorite so far.â€
â€œI love to smoke this at night because it makes me so sleepy and gives me a hard core case of the munchies. The flavor is AMAZING. It takes just like blackberry!â€

â€œWonderful. Not harsh on the throat. Good mix of buzzy body high and chill; my back spasms felt much better after smoking this. Could work if you need a bedroom boost. I had a really great bowl, flavors not overwhelming either.â€
â€œReal easy going high. More focused than expected too! This is a pretty solid balance of sativa and indica. I would recommend for physical pain and mental woes.â€

â€œBlackberry has an amazing taste. Im smoking on blackberry shatter from Oregon at the moment, and it smells exactly the same as the flower I had a month ago. Definitely a strong cerebral behind the eyes" feeling as well as strong sedative body buzz.â€"

â€œThis bud is sticky! It gums up my grinder and doesn't grind down very fine, but works like a dream!!

It definitely works on my back pain and inflammation. I don't get any heady" effects
column4: so for me it is great when I need to medicate but don't want to check out.â€"

column3: â€œamazing strain... another top shelf killer bud... must smoke if possible... great high and very very relaxingâ€
â€œGreat pain reliever. grind and vape. relax....suffering lower back pain this takes enough of the edge off the pain to be able to relax,â€
â€œBlackberry provides a optimal balance of sativa, cerebral effect with a thorough body effect.â€

â€œI normally make edibles to deal with pain and inflammation however this weekend decided to smoke some Blackberry while camping. My husband and I made dinner, laughed hysterically about a lot of things and my pain seemed to dissolve. Next morning I woke up feeling great in body and mind.â€
â€œThis is probably one of my favorite strains, the high is relaxing but you can still get a lot done. Definitely a keeper and would recommend to anyone!â€

â€œRelaxed, silent high. I agree with comments saying that this is more of an indica high. While I prefer sativas usually, this is a good high, esp for hanging out and watching tv and eating food.â€

â€œThe high of this strain was pretty stupefying for me.. It mellowed out quickly, but definitely felt very very strong whilst being low key.  I loved the fruity/flowery taste as well as the really interesting array of different colors ranging from light to dark green, purple to blue and everything in between.â€
â€œStrong hit on first toke...make you couchlock if not active! But good sweet berry taste and smoke.â€

â€œA solid smoke. It's got a great flavour, and a totally cool scent. More like berries than weed sometimes. 

It'll put you to sleep if you smoke more than a small-moderate amount, or so I find. Even then, it'll make you sleepy. 

But, the euphoria of the high is pretty excellent. You get absolutely enthralled in music, tv, and games. So its a good high if you've got free time. Not a productive high. Also I found i...â€
